dialogue: Oh ä,ü, where am I ? What is this place ?
Is there anyone ?
Hi there ! Welcome to this Interactive Game. I'm the director of this Hospital, and also a doctor.
(Oh, ok ?)
I'm very pleased to have you here. How do you feel ?
answer2: I've never wanted to be here !
answer3: Hum... I, I don't really know.

dialogue: This is wonderful ! I hope you're not too afraid of what will happens next.
Oh, don't leave yet, the fun hasn't began yet !
I know, I know. You will understand a bit more later.
(What does he means ? Now I'm afraid !!)
In this game you are going to meet lots of singular people. Some of them are nice, some others are more difficult to handle, but I hope you will be able to understand all of them !
So? Are we ready to start ?
answer2: No, no, I don't want to talk to people...
answer3: Huh, guess I have no choice.

dialogue: (Oh, so now I'm in the corridor)
Hi, nice to meet you !
Oh, hello ! Nice to meet you too.
Are you new here ?
answer1: Yes, and I'm a bit afraid...
answer2: I can ask you the same.

dialogue: Aww no, don't be. My colleagues and me will help you. Do not hesitate to ask us.
Thanks a lot... That's really nice !
(It seems that everything will be okay !
Well... I guess I'm here for the same reason as you ?
(Wow this dude seems more serious than expected... This begins badly...)
Oh... Are you lost ?
Yes. I have no idea of why neither how I'm here.
(I hope it will be okay in the future !)
(This girl looks a bit sad... Maybe I should talk to her ?)
I don't think so, but thanks for asking.
(Looks like I did good to ask her. Now she seems a bit better !)
*Looks at you with an angry face*
(Wow, now she looks even more angry ! Maybe I should have talked to her...)
Well, it obviously looks like that not everything is okay... But still, thanks for asking.
(Poor girl... I hope I will be able to help her.)
*Doesn't seem really happy*
(Oh my... This woman looks so angry, I could excuse myself to her for no reason... Should I say something ?)
No, thank you sweetie, but I'm fine.
Oh okay, do not hesitate to call the nurses or anyone at any time !
(Wow, what an attitude change !!)
Excuse-me? What did you just say ?
(Oh oh, I'm in trouble....)
Mmh... What are you looking at ?
I don't know... Nothing.
Well, take look somewhere else, I feel oppressed !
Sorry, Ma'am...
(This is not really good... But anyway...)
NA
